name: Playing with Dolls
description:
This was a highlight of my wildly successful 80s art show in 2018.
https://youtu.be/VnsxgFFXhjg

When I was a boy, I was fascinated with the human body. I enjoyed Barbie dolls because of their realistic representation, and removable clothes. This was not something a boy would brag about.

After all these years, nothing has changed… I’m still “playing with Ken and Barbie” and navigating the taboos of nudity.

Here I transform Sawyer Croft into a Barbie, and paint her alongside 10 Barbie dolls.

This 1/1 body painting was gifted to the collector celebrate my very first bid on Foundation.

bodypaint and photography by Roustan (bodypainter.com)
